Title: Enacts the NYCHA utility accountability act
Summary: Enacts the "NYCHA utility accountability act"; requires the NYCHA to provide a rent reduction to tenants who experience a disruption in utility service.
LawCode: Amd ยง402-e, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to enacting the "NYCHA utility accountability act"
